Name: PvZ2_Prerelease_KF_P8_fixed1

Updates.en: Added Recommended & Challenging Card Decks for Lost City, Dark Ages, Big Wave Beach, Frostbite Caves expansion levels.
Updates.zh: 为遗落古城、黑暗时代、巨浪沙滩、极寒冰窟的拓展关卡加入挑战、推荐卡组。

NewFeatures: 为遗落古城、黑暗时代、巨浪沙滩、极寒冰窟的拓展关卡加入挑战、推荐卡组。
EnNewFeatures: Added Recommended & Challenging Card Decks for Lost City, Dark Ages, Big Wave Beach, Frostbite Caves expansion levels.
